participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, loves to explore new things and enjoys singing.
participant_1.background: I am in the third grade. I love to go to Disney World every year. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth, enjoys listening to music while working outdoors.
participant_2.background: I help tend the fields. My father is a farmer. I like to listen to rock music while working. I've three Arabian horses.
